New Records: Suryakumar Yadav became the second-fastest Indian to reach 2500 T20I runs.
Sanju Samson scored the second-fastest hundred by an Indian in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Sanju Samson and Suryakumar Yadav formed a partnership of 173 runs for the second wicket.
Ravi Bishnoi took crucial wickets for India.
Pre-Game Insights: Gautam Gambhir emphasized the importance of selflessness and teamwork before the series started.
Suryakumar Yadav highlighted the need for flexibility in batting and bowling.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav praised the team's performance and reflected on the importance of selflessness.
The match was part of a 3-0 series win for India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad.
The series was a 3-0 sweep for India.
